segments.text: Tom , I've got good news for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Haven't you heard that your novel has won The Nobel Prize ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I can't believe it . It's like a dream come true . I never expected that I would win The Nobel Prize !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You did a good job . I'm extremely proud of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You certainly deserve it . Let's celebrate !
segments.speaker: S1
